fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Attack someone at night.
- Perform your host's abilities at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the game, you are attached to a player. Their Alignment and goal is changed to that of a Neutral Killing's and they become only able to win with you.
- You cannot be targeted. If someone attempts to target you, they are told you are an invalid target. This applies to each and every action in the game which targets other players.
- You do not interact with other players directly or indirectly. Everything that happens to your host happens to you.
- The first and second time your host would die, you will attach yourself to another player. The third time, you will die. Unstoppable and higher attacks, as well as lynches don't take this attribute into account, and kill you normally. Powerful attacks kill your host twice.
- Your host loses their immunities.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.
